__e: I haven't worked for insurance companies for a long time, and I don't think that really serves to atone for my participation in that mess.
Shit, there's got to be tons of these life insurance companies, right?
Believe it or not, Most of that pile is required by the insurance companies.
Well, you know what, I got a couple of other companies I want you to ask them about.
~ And I did a lot of checking with every cab company in your area.
Dad, I don't think you understand the whole story-- they've got dance troupes here-- what do you know about dancing?
I got a call from one of the companies that you set me up with--
The corporations who run them have interests here.
Yeah, this is one of those companies that started like us.
Anyway, he told me he would give me the books to one of his companies, and that if he liked my work, he would pay me twice my annual salary.
Sure it can, Billy... with time, good company, and patience.
I am looking at the future... of our two companies, and it looks very... naked.
